results.message: Detected the use of eval(). eval() can be dangerous if used to evaluate dynamic content. If this content can be input from outside the program, this may be a code injection vulnerability. Ensure evaluated content is not definable by external sources.
cwe: CWE-95: Improper Neutralization of Directives in Dynamically Evaluated Code ('Eval Injection')
results.cwe_name: Improper Neutralization of Directives in Dynamically Evaluated Code ('Eval Injection')
results.cwe_full_identifier: CWE-95: Improper Neutralization of Directives in Dynamically Evaluated Code ('Eval Injection')

results.message: Detected MD5 hash algorithm which is considered insecure. MD5 is not collision resistant and is therefore not suitable as a cryptographic signature. Use SHA256 or SHA3 instead.
cwe: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
results.cwe_name: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
results.cwe_full_identifier: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm

results.message: Detected a dynamic value being used with urllib. urllib supports 'file://' schemes, so a dynamic value controlled by a malicious actor may allow them to read arbitrary files. Audit uses of urllib calls to ensure user data cannot control the URLs, or consider using the 'requests' library instead.
cwe: CWE-939: Improper Authorization in Handler for Custom URL Scheme
results.cwe_name: Improper Authorization in Handler for Custom URL Scheme
results.cwe_full_identifier: CWE-939: Improper Authorization in Handler for Custom URL Scheme
